description.value:
Aspect fire

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You allow a portion of the fire magic housed in your relic to escape in a direction of your choice. You deal @Damage[1d10[fire]] damage for every 2 levels of the relic to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true]). You can't use Searing Wave again for [[/r 1d4 #Recharge Searing Wave]] rounds.
